attributes.action: Close Schools and Universities During the National Lockdown Restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
It is immoral and unethical to send students and teachers to school whilst other members of their household are having to sacrifice their employment and income in order to supress the virus.

Many Teachers and students are in danger of catching & spreading this virus, with it being almost impossible to socially distance in the majority of schools. Schools should be closed until the other National Restrictions are relaxed.
attributes.background: Close all Schools and educational facilities following the National Lockdown Restrictions imposed on the 5/11/2020, and supply funding for schools to encourage and enable online learning.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
